segments.text: My attention shifts to the left side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open upper cabinet, where a jar of cookies sits.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched, and the stool looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is definitely in the cookie jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, looking up with an expectant face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a sneaky operation they're running here, right under the adult's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way that stool is tilted, I'm genuinely worried he'll tumble backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a risky game for a handful of cookies, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The excitement on the girl's face is really sweet, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so focused on their mission, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
